name: Hari Patchwork Printed Shirt
description: While exploring NYC with friends, I visited TheRealReal's SOHO store for the first time. On the lower floor, a unique piece with vibrant colors, intricate patterns, and patchwork instantly grabbed my attention. Its distinctive design would undoubtedly make it a standout addition to my wardrobe. To my delight, the garment draped exactly as I had envisioned. Adding to the allure, a friend mentioned that Harry Styles had worn the same piece during his tour. Immediate purchase.

name: Cargo Trousers
description: Cargo trousers are cut to a regular fit with an elasticated waistband, mid-waist and long length. Crafted from ripstop cotton with an irregular faded finish, detailed with cargo and side pockets. Detailed with an Acne Studios logo embroidery. Regular fit | Mid waist | Elasticated waist | Long length | Acne Studios logo embroidery | Side seam and cargo pockets | Main material made from organically grown cotton.

name: Irving Shirt in Structure Knit
description: Our short-sleeve Irving shirt is cut for a standard fit and detailed with a point collar, and button-front closures. A style that feels both casual and modern, this version is cut from a premium cotton blend fabric that’s airy and maintains a polished appearance.

name: Sylvain Shirt in Structure Knit
description: A tailored style with minimal detailing, our Sylvain shirt is designed with a structured point collar, and a longer hem that easily tucks into your pant. Made of an ultra-compact knit with inherent stretch from one of Japan’s finest mills, it's designed for a comfortable, casual feel while still looking sharp. A modern everyday choice, this machine-washable fabric features a wrinkle-resistant construction for optimum shape retention throughout the day.

name: Panda Express Collab Hoodie

name: Non-Iron Stretch Shirt
description: Slim fit. The knitted fabric structure makes this shirt ultra comfortable & stretchy, while repelling stains & odour. The sealed Ascolite® button thread ensures you’ll never lose a button. Originally developed in collaboration with Kenneth Perez. It is stain repellent, odour repellent, wrinkle free, planet friendly, stretch cotton. Made of 100% Cotton | Certified by Better Cotton Initiative | Knitted in Portugal and sewn in North Macedonia | Hang tags, neck and care labels made of 100% recycled paper or 100% recycled polyester

name: Season 8 Wool Peacoat
description: John Elliott Season Eight Peacoat, Collar, Slit Pockets & Button Closure

name: The Heavyweight Overshirt
description: Our most versatile cool-to-cold-weather layer. The Heavyweight Overshirt works great as a shirt, as an easy light jacket, or as a warm mid-layer under a coat. Plus, the 8 oz heavy cotton twill is durable, warm, and twice as heavy as our Japanese Oxford cloth. Overshirt, over-sweater, under-jacket—your call.

name: Future Icons 3-Stripes Crew
description: Great for everything from recovery days at home to weekend workouts at the gym, the women's adidas Future Icons 3-Stripes crew sweatshirt has you covered with a relaxed fit and casual feel.

name: Dirt Overalls
description: Our standout sustainable Dirt Collection has dug up a new addition to the line: the Dirt Coverall. It feels like a soft, well-worn piece straight off the shelf, and the spandex gives just the right amount of stretch in the areas that need it to not hold you back. Being covered in dirt never looked so good, or felt so comfortable. Features & Specs | Midweight stretch twill organic cotton | Two front drop in hand pockets | Two back pockets | Enzymed washed | Sustainably garment-dyedWRAP certified production. Meeting fair labor standards for the safety, health, and wellness of employees. Responsibly-sourced organic cotton. Garment dyed process resulting in 95% less water consumption. GreenScreen Certified™ chemicals. Advanced e-Flow technology minimizes overall environmental impact by reducing energy usage, chemical use, material waste and wastewater.

name: Monto Vest
description: Polo-style waistcoat with V-neck, sleeveless, openwork diamond structure and ribbed finish.

name: Shaz Jacket
description: Our Shaz Jacket for our Willow Collection is a Rue Stiic favourite. The perfect set paired with our Alison Pants its a Corduroy dream! The Shaz Jacket is a relaxed fit crop jacket with button down front and front top pockets. Relaxed Fit | Cuffed Sleeves | Button Down Front | Collared | Corduroy

name: Printed Silk Scarf
description: Acne Studios denim blue printed scarf is crafted from silk with a crinkled finish. Printed | Crinkled finish | Measurements: 26 cm x 127 cm | Style ID: FN-UX-SCAR000311

name: The Plumber Pants
description: babes, these pants are the only thing that you need! Made from the highest quality cotton twill, these pants are gonna show off your crack better than any plumber could!!we're a diff breed of sustainable, genderless and Australian made clothing. We’re committing right now to manufacturing our garments right here in Australia. This way we’ll have more control over doing our bit to support other local businesses. This way we’ll have more control over where the swing tags, woven labels, and fabrics are coming from. This way we’ll have more control over how much waste is being created and how it's been recycled. This way we’ll have more control over the quality of our brand. This way we’ll have more control over ensuring our environment is protected.

name: Zero Jacket
description: Small and packable, this ultralight jacket is windproof and water-resistant. Take it hiking, cycling and running – or keep it in your backpack for a rainy day. | Key features | Weight: 61g | Windproof, water-resistant and practically weightless | Slightly fitted sleeve and bottom hems | Treated with a PFOS-free durable water repellent | Constructed with extremely lightweight materials | Stretchable mesh vents under both arms
material: Main: 100% Recycled Polyamide; Insert: 80% Polyamide, 20% Elastane

name: Beige V-Neck Vest
description: Knit cotton- and nylon-blend vest. Rib knit V-neck, cropped hem, and armscyes. Logo hardware at back collar.

name: Khaki H.D. Cargo Pants
description: Heavyweight cotton twill cargo pants. Features: Belt loops, Cord-lock drawstring at waistband, Four-pocket styling, Zip-fly, Darts at front waistband and cuffs, Cargo pocket at outseams, Unlined | As the brainchild of Japanese design veteran Keizo Shimizu, clothing label NEEDLES connotes a highly referential yet ultimately singular vision of menswear. Operating as Tokyo’s best-kept-secret before infiltrating New York City via the Shimizu-helmed Nephethens store, the brand freely integrates style cues from both cultures in equal measure. Shimizu’s early-life affinity for Ivy-league deadstock translates into off-kilter collegiate pieces, which are injected with a welcomed sense of unfamiliarity. Given his background at Nephethens, Shimizu approaches design from a retailer’s viewpoint, assembling collections that touch on a variety of styles while maintaining an air of calcultated curation. This stylistic patchwork gives way to multi-textile constructions that defy the rigidity of retrograde American menswear, offering an unexpected warmth to NEEDLES’s cross-cultural collage.

name: Sahara Convertible Pants
description: Hot days that start out cold; icy creeks to ford—the men's REI Co-op zip-off Sahara convertible pants take it all in stride. Just zip off the legs (you don't even have to sit down) and boom: shorts! Made with stretch recycled nylon that's durable enough to handle hard-charging days on the trail and log-sitting nights around the campfire Durable water repellent (DWR) coating sloughs off moisture while lightweight nylon dries fast if it does get wet Low-bulk fabric with flat-seam stitching not only prevents chafing, it also allows pants to pack down small Color-coded thigh zippers help you determine the right leg from the left leg when converting the shorts back to pants UPF 50+ fabric shields against harmful UV rays Full elastic back waistband allows you to move freely and comfortably Loaded with 6 pockets for essentials, including front hand pockets, back pockets and cargo pockets (1 zippered).

name: Sahara Convertible Pants
description: Hot days that start out cold; icy creeks to ford—the men's REI Co-op zip-off Sahara convertible pants take it all in stride. Just zip off the legs (you don't even have to sit down) and boom: shorts! Made with stretch recycled nylon that's durable enough to handle hard-charging days on the trail and log-sitting nights around the campfire Durable water repellent (DWR) coating sloughs off moisture while lightweight nylon dries fast if it does get wet Low-bulk fabric with flat-seam stitching not only prevents chafing, it also allows pants to pack down small Color-coded thigh zippers help you determine the right leg from the left leg when converting the shorts back to pants UPF 50+ fabric shields against harmful UV rays Full elastic back waistband allows you to move freely and comfortably Loaded with 6 pockets for essentials, including front hand pockets, back pockets and cargo pockets (1 zippered).

name: Men's Crew Midlayer Sailing Jacket
description: If you take one jacket on your next sailing trip, go for our favorite marine midlayer. Designed with our proprietary HELLY TECH® Protection technology – plus fleece lining – the all-purpose Crew is breathable while keeping you warm and dry. We enhanced it with the little things that count: a warming collar, adjustable cuffs, and dual hand pockets with brushed lining.
material: Shell: 100% Polyester, Lining1 : 100% Polyester, Lining 2: 100% Recycled Polyester

name: Merino Long-T
description: Stay natural, stay ready. The Merino Long-T looks like a regular long sleeve T-Shirt, but actually works so much harder. Natural antimicrobial properties keep odors at bay. Natural merino fibers are soft against your skin. Lightweight and abrasion resistant. Moisture wicking and quick drying to keep you feeling fresh.

name: Broad Peak IN Hooded Jacket
description: Developed as the go-to technical down for mountain adventures, and perfected over many years by seasoned mountaineers, the Broad Peak IN hooded jacket has earned its place at the core of our collection through countless miles in alpine conditions. A must-have for winter layering and summer alpine days alike, responsibly sourced 800 cuin fill power goose down provides exceptional warmth when you need it most. Fully recycled and abrasion resistant Pertex® Quantum outer material offers maximum thermal performance in a lightweight package that repels light rain and snow. Backpack and harness-compatible pockets, elasticated hood and two-way zipper will make this jacket a true workhorse for many years to come. Packing into its own pocket and weighing in at just 384g, this is one piece of gear you won’t want to leave home without.
material: Main: 100% Polyamide, Insert & Lining: 100% Polyamide, Filling: 90% White Goose Down, 10% White Goose Feather

name: Fuego Hooded Down Jacket
description: Packed with warm 800-fill-power goose down, the men's Cotopaxi Fuego Hooded Down jacket turns up the heat factor in a light, packable design you can layer and take just about anywhere.

name: Men's Crew Midlayer Sailing Jacket
description: This waterproof jacket is made to move with you on mountain trails and urban bike rides. Waterproof and breathable Glyde fabric is seam-sealed to keep you dry. Glyde Waterproof fabric is breathable and jacket is strategically seam-sealed to keep moisture out. Designed for: Training, Venting: Intentionally placed to encourage airflow, Secure storage: Zippered exterior pockets with a hidden phone sleeve, Shine-bright : Reflective detail helps keep you on the radar in low light, Customize your look: Cinchable hem.

name: Meta Jogger Pants
description: Comfort on your mind? Slip into the men's Vuori Meta Jogger pants and get lost in your thoughts. They're made with stretchy fabric that moves easily from workout to post-workout (or no workout) mode. Set in motion, the Meta Joggers are built for a life of movement. These joggers have a tapered jogger silhouette, performance technology and clean finishes. Features: Anti-Odor, Moisture Wicking, Quick Drying, Tapered Leg, UPF Rating, Zip Pocket

name: Meta Jogger Pants
description: Comfort on your mind? Slip into the men's Vuori Meta Jogger pants and get lost in your thoughts. They're made with stretchy fabric that moves easily from workout to post-workout (or no workout) mode. Set in motion, the Meta Joggers are built for a life of movement. These joggers have a tapered jogger silhouette, performance technology and clean finishes. Features: Anti-Odor, Moisture Wicking, Quick Drying, Tapered Leg, UPF Rating, Zip Pocket

name: Tank-T
description: When the temperature (and competition) heats up. This running tank is quick-drying with max airflow, while keeping weight to a minimum. Features: Taped seams, streamlined design, Sweat-wicking fabrics, Incredibly lightweight
